Arcangel/Tigerhawk/Depth Charge/Shocker/Icedragon




Arcangel shot down all thrashs missles with his fireballs. he pulled out his 
shot gun and started to fire sheels at him.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Tigerhawk

fired a lighting bolt at Thrash


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Depth Charge


fired three more ion disks


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Shocker



he fired two heat seeking missles.


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Icedragon



he started breathing his freezing breath.




[I was joking about the super sayin and please no body say that he is firing 
to many missles at the odds he is against i can see why]
